topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54eb69a76368726867b30c00#post_54eb69a76368726867b30c00
I see I see! Well the way I see it with kids is some kids are cute.

Yeah they get into mischief but eh they are kids.

But then you got the trouble maker's and bullies. Parents should talk to them so they don't grow up to be jerks. I sure know I grew up with some of those kind of kids. But either way yes they are indeed a handful!

(I wonder how my cousins doing now that I think about it?)

Also, speaking of hair my hair is a MESS. I need to get my mom to re braid it.

topics.body:
So more on that guy on tumblr from yesterday.

So I went on his page and looked at his description stuff.

He, no lie, has a button that says "Upset about something I posted? Click here" button.

And when you click it, it signs you out of Tumblr.
